title: How to Sync a Wii Fit Balance Board

steps.title: Put a Wii Balance Board compatible game (such as Wii Fit, which came in the same box as the board) in the Wii Console.
steps.content: Put a Wii Balance Board compatible game (such as Wii Fit, which came in the same box as the board) in the Wii Console. Start the game.

steps.title: Turn the Wii Balance Board upside down and remove the battery cover.
steps.content: Turn the Wii Balance Board upside down and remove the battery cover.

steps.title: Open the SD Card slot on the front to the Wii Console.
steps.content: Open the SD Card slot on the front to the Wii Console.

steps.title: Press and release the red sync on the bottom of the wii balance board.
steps.content: Press and release the red sync on the bottom of the wii balance board. Attempt to press both these buttons simultaneously or at least in quick succession.

steps.title: Press and release the SYNC button on the inside of the SD Card compartment on the console.
steps.content: Press and release the SYNC button on the inside of the SD Card compartment on the console.

steps.title: Watch.
steps.content: Watch. Synchronization can happen when the flashing light on balance board is still happening. Once the light stops flashing and becomes solid blue, the devices are connected.
